processingCommand.script:
! INC/CTASK
:SET &TYPE# = ""

:SET &IN_TICKET# = "${IN_TICKET}"
:PUB &IN_TICKET#

:IF &IN_TICKET#  <> ""
:  SET &INC# = SUBSTR(&IN_TICKET#,1,3)
:  SET &CTA# = SUBSTR(&IN_TICKET#,1,5)
:  IF &INC# = "INC"
:    SET &TYPE# = "INC"
:  ELSE
:    IF &CTA# = "CTASK"
:      SET &TYPE# = "CTASK"
:    ELSE
:      PRINT "WARNING - No valid INC/CTASK!"
:      SET &TYPE# = ""
:    ENDIF
:  ENDIF
:ENDIF
:PUBLISH &TYPE#,,WORKFLOW

:SET &ALERT_MESSAGE# = ""
:SET &INC_VALID# = "false"
:SET &CTASK_VALID# = "false"
:PUBLISH &ALERT_MESSAGE#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &INC_VALID#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &CTASK_VALID#,,WORKFLOW
